title: Queue times in OCE compared to NA
body: Hi may someone please tell me if the queue times in OCE are very slow? According to my friends, sometimes queueing for ranked matches can take up to an hour long? I'm planning to transfer my account to OCE server from the NA server as it is way closer to where I live and my ping will reduce considerably.

replies.body: Queue times vary from queue to queue and between different MMRs. If you play during Oceania peak hours (which I'd guestimate at 2pm to 11pm), you should have queue times between the 0-5 minute mark, on average.
Thanks for taking the time to reply!
